name: @woke/funder
description: Funding service - ensures new users receive enough ETH to claim their account

scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production ETH_ENV=production WOKE_ROLE=funder DEBUG=* node src/index.js
scripts.start:docker: ETH_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development CONTEXT=local DEBUG_RECOVERY=true DEBUG=* node src/index.js
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development ETH_ENV=development PERSIST=false CONTEXT=local DEBUG=*,twitter node src/index.js
scripts.mock: NODE_ENV=development ETH_ENV=development PERSIST=false CONTEXT=local DEBUG=* node src/mock.js

author: Jackson Virgo
